title: Met a proud Sanatani
selftext:
So i totally understand my mistake making a bad joke under a serious video. So this guy tabb999 made a new account I don't know for what reason but he commented me under a video in r/inidanostalgia about that he wants to talk I asked him many questions before accepting his chat request and so he started that he is a sanatani and he like edgy humour but after he send me(3rd photo 1st chat) so i didn't reply to him just hide him(I should have blocked him) because don't want to talk about hindu vs muslim or women hating, but that shit made him angry and u can ur self see that last comment in the third photo. 
P. S. I don't hate any muslim just don't like some islamic ideologies + I am very sorry for that comment and sorry for being an idiot edgy teen
comments: Naali ka keeda has a life worth than yours.
Well, this isn't a lone wolf incident when it comes to that sub. It's filled with hate mongering right wingers.
So is he k2wa larping as hindu right
